attributes.action: honour his promise, as stated in his manifesto, that he would stop the requirment for people to have to pay for their own care when they became old and unable to look after themselves. This petition calls upon the Prime Minister to honour his promise and give free care to the elderly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
